Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecureTestUtil.AccessTestAction
    An AccessTestAction performs an action that will be examined to confirm the results conform to expected access rights.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HbaseObjectWritableFor96Migration Deprecated
    This class is needed migrating TablePermissions written with Writables.

    Utility methods for testing security
